comments.author: Rottlock.6974
comments.body: Hey look at that, I was missing the obvious solution (rather, the obvious mistake I was making) like I thought I was. Sorry guys, brain was tired yesterday.

comments.author: Rottlock.6974
comments.body:
EDIT: I was retrieving the wrong data from the API, like a goober. Nothing to see here.

I’m developing a new GW2 app and currently working on the interactive map section. I wanted labels for Regions, Zones, and Sectors, and so far everything has gone really well, but a couple of the Zone areas are getting clogged with like 20 labels/names stacking on top of each other, and I realized that those zone areas include personal story quests. Additionally, many of these Personal Story quests have duplicate entries.

Is there any way I can filter out the personal stories from the map? Maybe there’s an obvious solution that I’m missing…
